title: Portfolio Next.js
longDescription: A portfolio site showcasing my projects and skills, built with Next.js. The site features a clean design, responsive layout, and easy navigation. It includes sections for my work, skills, and contact information.

title: House 18
description: Fullstack web application simulating a clothing store.
longDescription: House 18 is a fullstack web application built as part of a university project during the course Full Stack Development - DA219B at Kristianstad University. The app simulates a modern clothing store with user authentication, a responsive shopping exprerience and admin product management.

title: Trygga Tillsammans
description: The goal of the application is to increase the public awareness and preparedness regarding Sweden's total defense duty.
longDescription: Trygga Tillsammans is an Android application developed during the Mobile Application Development course. Its purpose is to increase public awareness and preparedness regarding Sweden's total defense duty. The app provides users with facts, checklists, quizzes, nearest shelters. It was a group project following agile workflows from concept to final product.

title: Solace
longDescription: Solace is a desktop application we developed during the Agile Development Methods course. Its purpose is to help users manage stress and anxiety by logging their mood and stress levels, which are visualized in a dashboard. The app is built with Python and Tkinter. It was a group project following agile workflows from concept to final product.

title: UserScope
description: Assignment for Frontend course at Kristianstad University
longDescription: This is a front end assignment in the course Front End at Kristianstad University. We learned how to fetch data from an API. There were also a lot of focus on semantic design and responsiveness.
